uninstall.nix_mode_disabled: Nix mode detected; service uninstall is disabled.
uninstall.cli_still_installed: CLI still installed. Remove via npm/pnpm if desired.
uninstall.workspaces_preserved: Tip: workspaces were preserved. Re-run with --workspace to remove them.

tools.image_size_error: Image could not be reduced below {maxMb}MB (got {gotMb}MB)

system.elevated_full: Elevated FULL ‚Äî exec runs on host with auto-approval.
system.elevated_ask: Elevated ASK ‚Äî exec runs on host; approvals may still apply.
system.elevated_off: Elevated OFF ‚Äî exec stays in sandbox.

tts.limit_invalid: ‚ùå Limit must be between 100 and 4096 characters.
tts.command_on: ‚Ä¢ /tts on ‚Äî Enable automatic TTS for replies
tts.summary_on: ‚Ä¢ Summary ON: AI summarizes, then generates audio
tts.summary_off: ‚Ä¢ Summary OFF: Truncates text, then generates audio
tts.examples_text: /tts provider edge\n/tts limit 2000\n/tts audio Hello, this is a test!
tts.audio_usage_text: Usage: /tts audio <text>\nExample: /tts audio Hello, this is a test!
tts.limit_description:
Text longer than this triggers summary (if enabled).
Range: 100-4096 chars (Telegram max).

To change: /tts limit <number>
Example: /tts limit 2000
tts.summary_description:
When text exceeds {maxLen} chars:
‚Ä¢ ON: summarizes text, then generates audio
‚Ä¢ OFF: truncates text, then generates audio

To change: /tts summary on | off

directives.unrecognized_verbose_level: Unrecognized verbose level "{level}". Valid levels: off, on, full.
directives.unrecognized_reasoning_level: Unrecognized reasoning level "{level}". Valid levels: on, off, stream.
directives.unrecognized_elevated_level: Unrecognized elevated level "{level}". Valid levels: off, on, ask, full.

session.group_activation_only: ‚öôÔ∏è Group activation only applies to group chats.

bash.disabled: ‚ö†Ô∏è bash is disabled. Set commands.bash=true to enable. Docs: https://docs.openclaw.ai/tools/slash-commands#config

validation.avatar_invalid_format: identity.avatar must be a workspace-relative path, http(s) URL, or data URI.
validation.avatar_outside_workspace: identity.avatar must stay within the agent workspace.
validation.heartbeat_target_empty: heartbeat target must not be empty
validation.plugin_disabled_with_config: plugin disabled ({reason}) but config is present

errors.recipient_required: Recipient is required for Telegram sends
errors.message_id_required: Message id is required for Telegram actions

pairing.ask_owner_approve: Ask the bot owner to approve with:

sessions.invalid_label_string: invalid label: must be a string

cron.delivery_config_isolated_only: cron delivery config is only supported for sessionTarget="isolated"

errors.no_response_generated: No response generated. Please try again.
errors.not_authorized: You are not authorized to use this command.
errors.file_too_large: ‚ö†Ô∏è File too large. Maximum size is {limitMb}MB.
errors.bot_token_missing: Telegram bot token missing for account "{accountId}" (set channels.telegram.accounts.{accountId}.botToken/tokenFile or TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN for default).
errors.reactions_unavailable: Telegram reactions are unavailable in this bot API.
errors.chat_not_found: Likely: bot not started in DM, bot removed from group/channel, group migrated (new -100‚Ä¶ id), or wrong bot token.
errors.download_failed: Failed to download telegram file: HTTP {status}
errors.username_resolve_help: If you had "@username" entries, re-run onboarding (it resolves @username to IDs) or replace them manually.
errors.delivery_fetch_unavailable: fetch is not available; set channels.telegram.proxy in config

commands.limits_warning: Telegram limits bots to 100 commands. {configured} configured; registering first 100. Use channels.telegram.commands.native: false to disable, or reduce plugin/skill/custom commands.
commands.plugin_invalid_name: Plugin command "{command}" is invalid for Telegram (use a-z, 0-9, underscore; max 32 chars).
commands.plugin_name_conflict: Plugin command "{command}" conflicts with an existing Telegram command.
commands.plugin_missing_description: Plugin command "{command}" is missing a description.

media.voice_as_audio: Telegram voice requested but media is {mediaType} ({filename}); sending as audio file instead.

voice_message.url_not_allowed: Voice message conversion requires a local file path; received a URL/protocol source: {path}
voice_message.upload_url_failed: Failed to get upload URL for voice message

reactions.invalid_target_timestamp: Invalid target timestamp for Signal reaction

errors.language_code_invalid: languageCode must be a 2-letter ISO 639-1 code (e.g. en, de, fr)
errors.normalization_invalid: applyTextNormalization must be one of: auto, on, off

system_prompt.inbound_only: Only use TTS when the user's last message includes audio/voice.
system_prompt.tagged_only: Only use TTS when you include [[tts]] or [[tts:text]] tags.
system_prompt.keep_short: Keep spoken text ‚â§{maxLength} chars to avoid auto-summary (summary {summarize}).
system_prompt.use_directives: Use [[tts:...]] and optional [[tts:text]]...[[/tts:text]] to control voice/expressiveness.

summarization.prompt:
You are an assistant that summarizes texts concisely while keeping the most important information. Summarize the text to approximately {targetLength} characters. Maintain the original tone and style. Reply only with the summary, without additional explanations.

<text_to_summarize>
{text}
</text_to_summarize>
